org.treetank.api
Interface ISession

All Known Implementing Classes:
Session
public interface ISession

ISession

Description

Each IDatabase is bound to multiple instances implementing ISession. Transactions can then be started from this instance. There can only be one IWriteTransaction at the time. However, multiple IReadTransactions can coexist concurrently.

Method Summary
 IReadTransaction beginReadTransaction()
          Begin a read-only transaction on the latest committed revision key.
 IReadTransaction beginReadTransaction(long pRev)
          Begin a read-only transaction on the given revision key.
 IReadTransaction beginReadTransaction(long pRev, IItemList pList)
          Begin a read-only transaction on the given revision and store any results in the fiven IItemList.
 IWriteTransaction beginWriteTransaction()
          Begin exclusive read/write transaction without auto commit.
 IWriteTransaction beginWriteTransaction(int pMaxNodes, int pMaxTime)
          Begin exclusive read/write transaction with auto commit.
 void close()
          Safely close session and immediately release all resources.
 String getUser()
          Returns user that is bound to the session.
 boolean isClosed()
          Test if session is closed.

beginWriteTransaction

IWriteTransaction beginWriteTransaction(int pMaxNodes,
                                        int pMaxTime)
                                        throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Begin exclusive read/write transaction with auto commit.

Parameters:
pMaxNodes - Count of node modifications after which a commit is issued.
pMaxTime - Time in seconds after which a commit is issued.
Returns:
IWriteTransaction instance.
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - If can't begin Write Transaction.

close

void close()
           throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Safely close session and immediately release all resources. If there are running transactions, they will automatically be closed. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the session is already closed.

Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - If can't close session.

isClosed

boolean isClosed()
Test if session is closed. Needed for check against database for creation of a new one.

Returns:
if session was closed

getUser

String getUser()
Returns user that is bound to the session.

Returns:
current session bound user.
